Package com.credenceid.face

Interface FaceEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BiometricsActivity, BiometricsManager
    public interface FaceEngine
    This interface contains all methods related to face detection, recognition, and matching.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  FaceEngine.Emotion
      Different emotions recognized by FaceEngine.
      static class  FaceEngine.Gender
      Different genders that are recognized by FaceEngine.
      static class  FaceEngine.HeadPoseDirection
      Different head pose directions, in human understandable format
      static interface  FaceEngine.OnAnalyzeFaceImageListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a request to analyzeFace(Bitmap, OnAnalyzeFaceImageListener) or analyzeFace(byte[], int, int, OnAnalyzeFaceImageListener) has finished.
      static interface  FaceEngine.OnCreateFaceTemplateListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a request to createFaceTemplate(Bitmap, OnCreateFaceTemplateListener) or createFaceTemplate(byte[], int, int, OnCreateFaceTemplateListener) has finished.
      static interface  FaceEngine.OnDetectFaceListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a request to detectFace(Bitmap, OnDetectFaceListener) or detectFace(byte[], int, int, OnDetectFaceListener) hash finished.
      static interface  FaceEngine.OnMatchFaceTemplatesListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a request to compareFace(byte[], byte[], OnMatchFaceTemplatesListener) has finished.
      static interface  FaceEngine.OnVerifyFaceLiveness
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a request to verifyFaceLiveness( Uri video, OnVerifyFaceLiveness) has finished.

    • Method Detail

      • detectFace

        void detectFace​(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                FaceEngine.OnDetectFaceListener onDetectFaceListener)
        Detects face in a given Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        image - Bitmap image to use for detecting a face.
        onDetectFaceListener - Callback invoked once detection is complete.

      • detectFace

        void detectFace​(byte[] imageBytes,
                int imageWidth,
                int imageHeight,
                FaceEngine.OnDetectFaceListener onDetectFaceListener)
        Detects face in a given Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        imageBytes - Bitmap image in byte array format.
        imageWidth - Image width.
        imageHeight - Image height.
        onDetectFaceListener - Callback invoked once detection is complete..

      • analyzeFace

        void analyzeFace​(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                 FaceEngine.OnAnalyzeFaceImageListener onAnalyzeFaceImageListener)
        Runs a variety of face estimations and detections. Please see FaceEngine.OnAnalyzeFaceImageListener for different values returned back.
        Parameters:
        image - Bitmap image to run face estimations on.
        onAnalyzeFaceImageListener - Callback invoked once analysis is complete.

      • analyzeFace

        void analyzeFace​(byte[] imageBytes,
                 int imageWidth,
                 int imageHeight,
                 FaceEngine.OnAnalyzeFaceImageListener onAnalyzeFaceImageListener)
        Runs a variety of face estimations and detections. Please see FaceEngine.OnAnalyzeFaceImageListener for different values returned back.
        Parameters:
        imageBytes - Bitmap image in byte array format.
        imageWidth - Image width.
        imageHeight - Image height.
        onAnalyzeFaceImageListener - Callback invoked once analysis is complete.

      • createFaceTemplate

        void createFaceTemplate​(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                        FaceEngine.OnCreateFaceTemplateListener onCreateFaceTemplateListener)
        Creates a face template used for matching.
        Parameters:
        image - Bitmap image to create face template from.
        onCreateFaceTemplateListener - Callback invoked when facial template creation is complete.

      • createFaceTemplate

        void createFaceTemplate​(byte[] imageBytes,
                        int imageWidth,
                        int imageHeight,
                        FaceEngine.OnCreateFaceTemplateListener onCreateFaceTemplateListener)
        Creates a face template used for matching.
        Parameters:
        imageBytes - Bitmap image in byte array format.
        imageWidth - Image width.
        imageHeight - Image height.
        onCreateFaceTemplateListener - Callback invoked when facial template creation is complete.

      • compareFace

        void compareFace​(byte[] templateOne,
                 byte[] templateTwo,
                 FaceEngine.OnMatchFaceTemplatesListener onMatchFaceTemplatesListener)
        Matches two face templates ands returns match percentage in range [0, 100].
        Parameters:
        templateOne - First face template.
        templateTwo - Second face template.
        onMatchFaceTemplatesListener - Callback invoked when matching is complete.

      • verifyFaceLiveness

        void verifyFaceLiveness​(android.net.Uri video,
                        FaceEngine.OnVerifyFaceLiveness onVerifyFaceLiveness)
        Verifies face liveness and returns result using OnVerifyFaceLiveness callback.
        Parameters:
        video - Uri of the video to be analysed.
        onVerifyFaceLiveness - Callback invoked when livensess verification is completed.

      • detectFaceSync

        DetectFaceSyncResponse detectFaceSync​(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                                      int timeout)
        Synchronously detects a face in a given Bitmap image. Internally this API call makes an asynchronous call and then waits for a result back. In the case result takes longer then four seconds to return, Android would throw an ANR. In order to get around this, we allow a timeout period to be specified, meaning for how long should method wait for a response back, before returning back to client.
        Parameters:
        image - Bitmap image to detect face in.
        timeout - Timeout period to wait before returning with result.
        Returns:
        Wil never return null.

      • detectFaceSync

        DetectFaceSyncResponse detectFaceSync​(byte[] imageBytes,
                                      int imageWidth,
                                      int imageHeight,
                                      int timeout)
        Synchronously detects a face in a given Bitmap image. Internally this API call makes an asynchronous call and then waits for a result back. In the case result takes longer then four seconds to return, Android would throw an ANR. In order to get around this, we allow a timeout period to be specified, meaning for how long should method wait for a response back, before returning back to client.
        Parameters:
        imageBytes - Bitmap image in byte array format.
        imageWidth - Image width.
        imageHeight - Image height.
        timeout - Timeout period to wait before returning with result.
        Returns:
        Wil never return null.

                                                      int imageWidth,
                                                      int imageHeight,
                                                      int timeout)

In order to get around this, we allow a timeout period to be specified, meaning for how long should method wait for a response back, before returning back to client.

        Returns:
        Wil never return null.

      • compareFaceSync

        CompareFaceSyncResponse compareFaceSync​(byte[] templateOne,
                                        byte[] templateTwo,
                                        int timeout)
        Synchronously compares two face templates and returns a matching score. Internally this API call makes an asynchronous call and then waits for a result back. In the case result takes longer then four seconds to return, Android would throw an ANR. In order to get around this, we allow a timeout period to be specified, meaning for how long should method wait for a response back, before returning back to client.
        Parameters:
        templateOne - First face template compare.
        templateTwo - Second face template to compare.
        timeout - Timeout period to wait before returning with result.
        Returns:
        Will never return null.
